locale_entry.Name: MetraTech.MetraNet.NotificationEvents/NotificationEventTemplate/FAILED_ADAPTERS_TEMPLATE
locale_entry.Value: [es-mx]Adapter {tx_name}, instance id {id_instance} for run {id_run} has failed with the error {tx_detail}.

locale_entry.Name: MetraTech.MetraNet.NotificationEvents/NotificationEventTemplate/GROUP_SUBSCRIPTION_ENDING_TEMPLATE
locale_entry.Value: [es-mx]Account {varloginname} participation in subscription to {varpointernalname} will end on {varenddate} <a style='cursor: pointer;' id='manage1_{varaccount}' href='JavaScript:getFrameMetraNet().Account.Load({varaccount});'> View...</a>

locale_entry.Name: MetraTech.MetraNet.NotificationEvents/NotificationEventTemplate/SUBSCRIPTION_ENDING_TEMPLATE
locale_entry.Value: [es-mx]Account {varloginname} has subscription to {varpointernalname} that will end on {varenddate}<a style='cursor: pointer;' id='manage1_{varaccount}' href='JavaScript:getFrameMetraNet().Account.Load({varaccount});'> View...</a>
